name: Gopplers
description:
A game made in 48 hour for the MashUp GameJam 2021 !!

You have to decide, will you shoot the Gopplers? 

Will you feed them?

Is up to you !!

NOTE: Please, download the windows version of the game. For some reason the graphics are messed up in the browser's version. (In the screenshots you see how it should look)
